title: Is there a Comcast outage affecting League?
body: My brother and I haven't been able to play League reliably today, and now I can't even get into a game. The client keeps disconnecting and freezing up, though I have no issues whatsoever if I'm in a game. Mr/Ms Nami Main told me to run a fancy trace route, and it just times out as soon as it reaches the street, though my internet works fine for everything but League.

replies.body: I don't really have visibility on the ongoings of ISP, so I couldn't say for sure.  Are you able to check on the status of your ISP in your region through their support page?  Otherwise, even if your internet is fine there could be issues reaching our game servers.  Try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case something local to your PC/network might be causing the block.  You can test this out in a custom game to provide any penalties as well.  Let me know if you have any questions!
